tool_description: Using a machine learning model, this API converts an MP3 file from a URL into text. It only works with English and is perfectly suited for solving audio captchas.
name: Audio To Text
title: Audio To Text

api_list.name: Convert MP3 URL to text
api_list.description: This Endpoint allows you to pass the URL of an MP3 to the API and wait for the transcription.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://audio-to-text4.p.rapidapi.com/captcha"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "audio-to-text4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://audio-to-text4.p.rapidapi.com/captcha"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "audio-to-text4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
